result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ryan D. Reitman

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Affidavit of Services for Court appointed counsel and billing statement, received and filed, by Atty Babe.  **no paper copy in physical file**

Defendant Ryan D. Reitman in court with Attorney Katie Elizabeth Babe.  Jayne Davis Dewire appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  This case is dismissed and read-in for Defendant's plea to Case #16CM385.
Wisconsin Community Service non-compliance letter received and filed.  **no paper copy in physical file**
Court received information from Wisconsin Community Services regarding defendant's compliance/non-compliance.
Defendant to pay: $50/month, commencing on 04/01/16. Atty Babe has been appointed.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Defendant Ryan D. Reitman in court.  Barbara Ann Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is requesting court appointed counsel.  Court reviews petition and grants Defendant's request for court appointed counsel.  Defendant to pay for such counsel at rate of $50.00 per month (2 cases - $50.00 on each case), commencing 4/1/16 and on the 1st day of each month thereafter until paid in full.  Court sets a status of counsel date.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for April 1, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Wisconsin Community Service non-compliance letter received and filed.

Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness listed in the Criminal Complaint.  Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed. Defendant to comply with all orders in Waukesha Case #15CV1479.  Defendant to report/comply with Wisconsin Community Services Pretrial Supervision Program to report immediately after court.
Defendant Ryan D. Reitman in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Hearing scheduled for February 29, 2016 at 09:00 am.  Not recorded.
Case called at 10:55 a.m.  Defendant Ryan D. Reitman not in court.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cout issues a capias.  Bail is ordered revoked and forfeited.

Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness listed in the Criminal Complaint.  Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed. Defendant to comply with all orders in Waukesha Case #15CV1479.

Defendant Ryan D. Reitman in court.  Lesli S Boese appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court advises of right to an attorney.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for January 11, 2016 at 10:30 am.
